notes.title: Online Learning Platform
notes.note:
A platform for users to access courses, track progress, and receive certifications.2
Features:
User authentication (students and instructors)
Course creation and management
Video and text-based lessons
Quizzes and assessments
Progress tracking
Discussion forums

notes.title: Food Delivery  User
notes.note:
User Module
User Authentication and Authorization

Sign Up: User registration with email and password.
Login: Secure user login with JWT tokens.
Logout: Secure logout functionality.
User Profile Management

View Profile: Display user details.
Edit Profile: Update user information.
Change Password: Secure password change functionality.
Browse and Search Dishes

View Dish List: Display a list of available dishes.
Search Dishes: Search dishes by name or category.
Filter Dishes: Filter dishes by category, ratings, etc.
Order Management

Cart System: Add items to the cart, update quantities, and remove items.
Checkout Process: Place orders and make payments.
Order Tracking: Track order status.
Order History: View past orders and their details.
Ratings and Reviews

Rate and Review Dishes: Allow users to rate and review dishes.
View Reviews: Display ratings and reviews for dishes.

notes.title: Food Delivery Admin
notes.note:
Admin Module
User Management

View Users: Display a list of registered users.
Edit User Details: Update user information.
Delete User: Remove a user from the system.
Dish Management

Add Dishes: Add new dishes to the platform.
Edit Dishes: Update dish details.
Delete Dishes: Remove dishes from the platform.
Order Management

View Orders: Display a list of all orders.
Update Order Status: Change the status of an order (e.g., pending, delivered).
Reporting and Analytics

Sales Reports: Generate reports on sales and revenue.
User Activity Reports: Generate reports on user activities.

notes.title: Event Booking System
notes.note:
A platform for booking tickets to various events.
Features:

User authentication and profiles
Event listings with details and images
Ticket booking and payment integration
Event reminders and notifications
Review and rating system for events
Admin dashboard for managing events

notes.title: Music Streaming App
notes.note:
A platform for streaming music.
Features:

User authentication and profiles
Music library with search and filter options
Playlists creation and management
Like and share tracks
Recommendations based on listening history
Offline listening feature

notes.title: Language Learning App
notes.note:
A platform for users to learn and practice new languages.
Features:

User authentication and profiles
Lessons and quizzes for different languages
Flashcards and vocabulary exercises
Progress tracking and achievements
Community forums for practice
Voice recognition for pronunciation practice
